title: 関数5
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#c586c0>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#358cd6>int</color> a = 2;
<color=#358cd6>int</color> func<color=#ffd700>(</color>int x,int y<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
	a += 1;
	<color=#c586c0>return</color> x + y;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
	<color=#358cd6>int</color> b = 3,c;
	c = func<color=#ffd700>(</color>a,b<color=#ffd700>)</color>;

<color=#ffd700>}</color>
